H3.text: when did the three little pigs come out. 1933

A4.text: Three Little Pigs is a 1933 American animated short film released by United Artists.

A5.text: Three Little Pigs premiered at the Radio City Music Hall as a short subject to Radio City's release of the First National Pictures film Elmer, the Great on May 25, 1933, in New York City.
